intent_atoms.description: Provide VoiceOver-friendly labels for all UI elements in the SwiftUI interface of ISOInspectorUI.
Enable Dynamic Type adaptability so that layout remains readable at large content sizes across tree, detail, and hex views.
Implement full keyboard navigation allowing selection of tree nodes, pane switching, and toolbar action activation without a pointing device.
VoiceOver must announce meaningful descriptions for tree rows, detail fields, validation badges, and hex viewer sections, with rotor navigation enabling box-to-box traversal.
Dynamic Type scaling should preserve layout readability without truncating metadata or controls in all primary views.
Keyboard navigation must allow selecting tree nodes, switching panes, and activating toolbar actions, following logical reading sequence focus order.
Automated accessibility checks using XCTest + Accessibility Inspector run in CI to verify labels and focus behaviors, with documentation of the test plan.
All SwiftUI views must have populated accessibilityLabel, accessibilityValue, and accessibilityHint properties derived from MP4RA metadata where applicable.
Use @FocusState and FocusScope to manage focus between tree selection and detail pane editing via keyboard input.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Labeling for Tree Rows
functional_units.description: Provide VoiceOver-friendly labels, values, and hints for each row in the tree view using MP4RA metadata.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Labeling for Detail Fields
functional_units.description: Announce meaningful descriptions for fields in the detail pane, including validation badges.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Labeling for Hex Viewer Sections
functional_units.description: Ensure VoiceOver announces sections of the hex viewer with appropriate labels and rotor navigation support.

functional_units.name: Dynamic Type Support for Primary Views
functional_units.description: Apply dynamicTypeSize modifiers to tree, detail, and hex views so layout scales without truncation.

functional_units.name: Keyboard Navigation for Tree Selection
functional_units.description: Allow users to navigate and select tree nodes using keyboard keys and focus management.

functional_units.name: Keyboard Navigation for Pane Switching
functional_units.description: Enable switching between tree, detail, and hex panes via keyboard shortcuts or focus traversal.

functional_units.name: Keyboard Activation of Toolbar Actions
functional_units.description: Activate toolbar buttons and actions from the keyboard without a pointing device.

functional_units.name: Focus Management with @FocusState/FocusScope
functional_units.description: Coordinate focus across tree selection and detail editing using SwiftUI focus APIs.

functional_units.name: Automated Accessibility Testing in CI
functional_units.description: Run XCTest accessibility assertions and Accessibility Inspector snapshots as part of continuous integration.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Test Documentation
functional_units.description: Document test plans, results, and blockers in the research gaps document.
